ActIndian Act
SubjectTransfer of administration and control of lands within a reserve - British Columbia
PrecisOrder a) consenting to the exercise of the power of the province of British Columbia to take lands on GITANMAAX Indian Reserve NÂ° 1, in British Columbia, pursuant to subsection 35(1) of the Indian Act; b) authorizing, in lieu of such taking, the transfer of administration and control of the required lands, pursuant to subsection 35(3) of the Indian Act.
